p: In this study, samples were collected from camels imported from Sudan (719) which included 655 males and 64 females, and camels imported from Djibouti (169) which were all males. The camelsâ€™ ages for imported camels ranged from 1 to 5 years. The study also included camel samples that were collected from domestic camel collected from local camel farms and slaughterhouses in the Jeddah area (284) including 244 males and 40 females, their ages ranged from <1 to 5 years.
